problems.text: A bacteria population doubles every hour. If there are initially 3 bacteria, how many bacteria are there after 8 hours?
An investor deposits $1000 at 5% interest per year compounded annually. What is the total after 6 years?
A ball is dropped from 2 meters and bounces to 3/4 of its previous height each time. How high does it bounce on the 5th bounce?
A tree grows 10% taller every year. If its current height is 5 meters, what will be its height after 7 years?
A savings account deposits $500 each year, and each deposit earns 6% compounded annually. How much will the 10th deposit be worth after 10 years?
A fungus grows at a rate of 1.5 times its previous size every day. If it starts at 2 grams, what is its weight on the 9th day?
